name: Strawberry Paletas
description: These paletas are 100% vegan and use only natural ingredients. No guilt when the kids ask for seconds!
recipeIngredient: 4 cups Strawberries (fresh, hulled, cut into quarters)

recipeInstructions.text: Place strawberries in a large bowl and sprinkle sugar over them. Mix well. Let sit for 20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Place strawberries in a large bowl and sprinkle sugar over them. Mix well. Let sit for 20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Place strawberries in a medium sauce pot and add 1/2 cup of water and place over medium eat. Simmer softly for 5 minutes. Let mixture cool to room temperature.
recipeInstructions.name: Place strawberries in a medium sauce pot and add 1/2 cup of water and place over medium eat. Simmer softly for 5 minutes. Let mixture cool to room temperature.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the mixture is cool, place in a blender, add the lemon juice, and process to desired consistency. Your paletas can be chunky or smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the mixture is cool, place in a blender, add the lemon juice, and process to desired consistency. Your paletas can be chunky or smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into your molds, snap on the lids, and freeze for at least 5 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into your molds, snap on the lids, and freeze for at least 5 hours.

keywords: homemade paletas, strawberry paletas, vegan paletas
